error.title: C'è un problema sui nostri sistemi
error.body: Riprova tra qualche minuto. Se si ripete, contatta l'assistenza.

alert.title: Vuoi interrompere l'operazione?
alert.body: Dovrai ripetere di nuovo tutti i passaggi

comfortable.title: Confortevole
comfortable.description: Progettato per una migliore leggibilità dei testi

standard.title: Standard
standard.description: Lo stile di sempre, con forme strette e geometriche

forgot.title: Did you forget the the unlock code?
forgot.confirmTitle: Did you forget the unlock code?
forgot.confirmMsg: To be able to choose a new unlock code you will need to log in again.
forgot.confirmMsgWithTask: To be able to choose a new unlock code you will need to cancel the current procedure and log in again.

error.deviceLocked: Authentication was not successful, the device currently in a lockout of 30 seconds
error.DeviceLockedPermanent: Authentication was not successful, device must be unlocked via password

cancelOperation.title: Do you want to stop the operation?
